title: Ukishima Garden
typeOfFood: Vegan, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Beer/Wine, European, Fusion
description: Vegan shojin cuisine restaurant in traditional machiya-style house close to the Nishiki market, opened Apr 2016. Its flagship location is in Okinawa. Contemporary vegan-meets-Shojin cuisine using organic local vegetables & millets, prepared condiments (vinegar, miso, and soy sauce). Menu ranges from Japanese Shojin, Italian, French to Oriental. Selection of wine and sake.
